Watcher

Summon Units:#768 Watcher
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The mage creates a stone statue and gives it awareness and magical powers. The Watcher is placed on a tower or at a place with a view over the surrounding landscape and given the task of guarding a province from prying eyes. Watchers have incredible vision and will easily detect enemy scouts and spies. They are charged with air magic and can blast enemies with lightning.
Watcher Patrol Bonus: 50
